shortBio: Gordon Ramsay is a British celebrity chef, restaurateur, and TV personality known for his multiple Michelin-starred restaurants and fiery personality.

Jamie Oliver is a British chef, restaurateur, and television personality, born on May 27, 1975, in Clavering, England. He rose to fame with his television showand has since hosted several other cooking shows.
Nigella Lawson is a British food writer, journalist, and television personality, born on January 6, 1960, in London, England. She is best known for her cooking shows and cookbooks
Bobby Flay is an American celebrity chef, restaurateur, and television personality, born on December 10, 1964, in New York City.
Ina Garten is an American cookbook author, television personality, and former White House staff member, born on February 2, 1948, in Brooklyn, New York
